cast.overview: Two 13-year-old boys spend an idyllic summer together, but their connection is put to the test when they become the subject of speculation at school.
cast.title: Close

details.biography:
Belgian-born young actor and dancer.

Eden Dambrine is known for Close (2022), L'invité (2000) and On est en direct (2020).

The career of the young actor, who received complimentary reviews from many festivals and film critics with his movie 'Close' in 2022, changed after he met Lukas Dhont at the age of 14 during a train journey.

The young Belgian actor, whom we will see more of on the big screen, is currently busy with the promotional work of the movie 'Close' and modeling for fashion magazines.

- IMDb Mini Biography By: yusufpiskin
details.name: Eden Dambrine
